title: [BUG] logging pytorch model hits tag size limit

labels.name: area/tracking
labels.description: Tracking service, tracking client APIs, autologging

body:
### Willingness to contribute

I'm willing to contribute. I can fix the bug with some guidance on what the preferred solution would be. 

### System information
Ubuntu 20.04

- **Have I written custom code (as opposed to using a stock example script provided in MLflow)**:
- **OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**: Ubuntu 20.04
- **MLflow installed from (source or binary)**: With pip
- **MLflow version (run ``mlflow --version``)**: mlflow, version 1.18.0
- **Python version**: Python 3.8.10

### Describe the problem

This error raised when logging a pytorch artifact with [mlflow.pytorch.log_model](https://www.mlflow.org/docs/latest/python_api/mlflow.pytorch.html#mlflow.pytorch.log_model)

```
2021/08/14 09:27:55 ERROR mlflow.utils.rest_utils: API request to http://localhost:5000/api/2.0/mlflow/runs/log-model failed with code 500 != 200, retrying up to 2 more times. API response body: {"error_code": "INTERNAL_ERROR", "message": "Tag value '[{\"run_id\": \"e6d28c2c8c7a48808f63ab0a8766dc1c\", \"artifact_path\": \"models\", \"utc_time_created\": \
"2021-08-12 16:50:32.052540\", \"flavors\": {\"pytorch\": {\"model_data\": \"data\", \"pytorch_version\": \"1.7.1+cu110\"}, \"python_function\": {\"pickle_module_name\": \"m' had length 5348,
 which exceeded length limit of 5000"}
```

### Code to reproduce issue

I can't get a small reproducible example. I don't know why the data for this API request is so long. I litteraly use the following line to log the pytorch model, where fit.model is a pytorch `nn.Module`. 

```
        mlflow.pytorch.log_model(fit.model, self.model_dir)
```

I suspect our training code does somethign to the pytorch net which makes the log really long and therefore it can't be stored in a tag, which is what mlflow is using to store their model information. 

### Other info / logs
-

- [ ] `area/scoring`: MLflow Model server, model deployment tools, Spark UDFs
- [ ] `area/server-infra`: MLflow Tracking server backend
